name: part_001
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら生誕祭2025】生誕3D LIVE！FEVER！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [uB6GxHc7PRc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Pekora Usada performing the song 'Distance' during her birthday live.
MC segment where Pekora greets the audience and discusses the live performance.
Slot machine-style transition animation featuring Pekora Usada.
Pekora Usada and Nakiri Ayame performing the song 'Redo'.

subtitles.original: Distance ~Special Full Version~
subtitles.english: Distance ~Special Full Version~

subtitles.original: もう振り向かず歩いて行けるさ
subtitles.english: I can keep walking without looking back now

subtitles.original: いつかまた逢うその日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day we meet again

subtitles.original: 君の夢がきっと叶うように
subtitles.english: So that your dreams will surely come true

subtitles.original: あの星に願っているよ
subtitles.english: I'm wishing upon that star

subtitles.original: どんなに遠くふたり離れても
subtitles.english: No matter how far apart we are

subtitles.original: ずっと君を想っている
subtitles.english: I'll always be thinking of you

subtitles.original: この寂しさを乗り越えられたら
subtitles.english: Once we've overcome this loneliness

subtitles.original: きっと笑顔でまた逢える
subtitles.english: We can surely meet again with a smile

subtitles.original: また逢える...
subtitles.english: Meet again...

subtitles.original: また逢える...
subtitles.english: Meet again...

subtitles.original: また逢える...
subtitles.english: Meet again...

subtitles.original: ちょっとマイク取られちゃったぺこだけど、まあいっか！
subtitles.english: I got my mic taken away, but oh well!

subtitles.original: みんな！ぺこらの生誕ライブに来てくれてありぺこー！
subtitles.english: Everyone! Thanks for coming to Pekora's birthday live!

subtitles.original: 本日のハッシュタグは #兎田ぺこら生誕祭2025、たくさん呟いてね！
subtitles.english: Today's hashtag is #PekoraBirthday2025. Please tweet a lot!

subtitles.original: というわけで、もう一曲目の曲からなんとなく
subtitles.english: So, since the first song...

subtitles.original: あれ？今回のライブのテーマ、あれなのかな？って思った人もいると思いますが
subtitles.english: ...some of you might be thinking, "Wait, is that the theme of this live?"

subtitles.original: まずはステージを見てください！
subtitles.english: But first, take a look at the stage!

subtitles.original: たらー！すごいの！なんだこれは！これはなんなんだー！
subtitles.english: Ta-da! It's amazing! What is this?! What in the world is this?!

subtitles.original: ということでね、まあこの後ちょっとゲストパートもあるぺこなんですけども
subtitles.english: So, there's going to be a guest segment later.

subtitles.original: まあみんなが知ってる曲だったりとか
subtitles.english: I'll be performing songs everyone knows...

subtitles.original: もしかしたら知らない曲もあるかと思いますが
subtitles.english: ...and maybe some you don't.

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃね、楽しい曲もあるぺこですので
subtitles.english: There are some really fun songs as well...

subtitles.original: お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: ...so look forward to it!

subtitles.original: というわけで、じゃあ早速、行ってきやしょう！
subtitles.english: All right then, let's get right into it!

subtitles.original: ではではー！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: 舞台
subtitles.english: Stage

subtitles.original: スーパーぺこらBONUS
subtitles.english: Super Pekora BONUS

subtitles.original: Redo
subtitles.english: Redo

subtitles.original: 自分の過去に囚われ迷って
subtitles.english: Trapped and lost in my own past

subtitles.original: そうじゃないよと言い聞かせて全てを自由に
subtitles.english: Telling myself "That's not it" and setting everything free

subtitles.original: 操れるかなんてわからないよと空は霞んで
subtitles.english: The sky hazes over as I wonder if I can control it

subtitles.original: 正解はどこ？
subtitles.english: Where is the answer?

subtitles.original: 僕の手のひらに残る大事なもの
subtitles.english: The precious thing remaining in my palm

subtitles.original: 忘れない記憶
subtitles.english: Unforgettable memories

subtitles.original: 何度でも
subtitles.english: Time and again...

subtitles.original: 君を守り抜くと叫んで
subtitles.english: ...I shout that I will protect you to the end

subtitles.original: 巻き戻しの中掴んだ合図を
subtitles.english: The signal I grasped while rewinding

subtitles.original: 離さない...
subtitles.english: I won't let go...
